```
[
  '(:action grind ; Grind ingredients using a tool
    :parameters (?p - agent ?tool - tool ?ing - ingredient)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?tool) (clean ?tool) (empty ?tool) (separate ?ing))
    :effect (and (full ?tool) (dirty ?tool) (mixed ?ing)))',

  '(:action mix ; Mix items and update their states
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?tool - tool ?item - mixable)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?tool) (full ?tool) (dirty ?tool) (not (mixed ?item)))
    :effect (mixed ?item))',

  '(:action transfer ; Transfer an item from one container to another
    :parameters (?p - agent ?source - container ?destination - container ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?source) (contains ?source ?item) (not (contains ?destination ?item)) (empty ?destination))
    :effect (and (not (contains ?source ?item)) (contains ?destination ?item)))',

  '(:action pour_into_air_tight_container
    :parameters (?p - agent ?c - container ?a - air_tight_container ?ing - ingredient)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?c) (full ?c) (thoroughly_mixed ?ing) (empty ?a))
    :effect (and (full ?a) (empty ?c) (air_tight ?a)))',

  '(:action pour
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?source - container ?destination - container ?content - substance)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?source) (full ?source) (thoroughly_mixed ?content) (empty ?destination))
    :effect (and (full ?destination) (empty ?source) (air_tight ?destination)))'
]
```
